Well the blonde and black haired guys are brothers. She always had a crush on the elder brother and so has sex with him. Throughout the first 2 chapters however she was becoming more aware of the younger one, but she had no feelings for him prior. By the time he confessed, she was already in a relationship with the elder brother, who got jealous and asked her to reject him on phone. It essentially ends with her saying that it doesn't matter if she strays, the elder brother will always be there to reprimand her. If we had seen this through the elder brother's perspective it wouldn't be wholesome but it would def be vanilla.
I dunno, this isn’t even listed as NTR in the official Japanese or English releases. It does leave us feeling bad for Takeshi, but the girl he likes is in a relationship with someone else.
